message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.CC, cs.CR 

The paper deals with the construction of combinatorial batch codes, which is a problem in information theory (cs.IT). The construction involves analyzing and derandomizing a randomized construction, which involves techniques from algorithms and data structures (cs.DS) and distributed computing (cs.DC). The paper also discusses the possibility of parallel derandomization, which falls under the category of parallel computing (cs.CC). Finally, the paper deals with the security aspects of the construction, which falls under the category of cryptography (cs.CR).
